mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_RIGHT(ID, NAME, TYPE, REMARK) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{remark})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.ID, decode(r.TYPE,'menu',m.HREF,r.NAME) NAME, r.TYPE, decode(r.TYPE,'menu',m.NAME,r.REMARK) REMARK, r.STATUS FROM SYS_RIGHT r LEFT JOIN SYS_MENU m on r.NAME = m.ID WHERE r.STATUS='0'
AND r.TYPE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{type}),'%')
AND r.NAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%') or m.href LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_RIGHT SET STATUS='1' WHERE ID = #{id} and STATUS = '0'
